item.title: Guidance for CVE-2024-0012, CVE-2024-9474 affecting PAN-OS using Microsoft Security capabilities
item.description: A new critical vulnerability affecting PAN-OS has been identified and published last week, putting organizations using Palo Alto Networks’ firewalls at risk. In this blog post, we will demonstrate how you can use Microsoft Security tools discover assets in your organization that are vulnerable to the new critical unauthenticated Remote Code Execution (RCE) flaws in PAN-OS and provide guidelines on remediation. Additionally, we will show you how to use the capabilities of Attack Path analysis together with the Microsoft Security tools to identify how attackers could potentially gain access and ...
